checks.name: License / Permissions
checks.notes:
KSL will provide NGC container for the requested version of PyTorch. 
nvcr.io/nvidia/pytorch:25.12-py3

NVIDIA Deep Learning Container License
Permissions:
- Install and Use
- Deploy as a Service
- Create Derived Containers
- Open Source Development
Restrictions:
- No Reverse Engineering

nvcr.io/nvidia/pytorch:25.12-py3 contains

NVIDIA NCCL (optimized for NVLink)
NVIDIA Data Loading Library (DALI)
TensorRT
Torch-TensorRT

checks.name: Project & Usage Alignment
checks.notes:
This is a library to program and train graph neural networks. The proposal mentions training GNNs as an objective. Aligns with the approved research topic Datascience and engineering. 
KSL will provide the Pyg container image from NVIDIA and update with required software.

checks.name: Prohibited Use Screening (LC 2.7)
